definition[0]: a situation in which a disease is spread by people touching each other
example[0]: There is some danger of contagion.
definition[1]: a disease that can be passed from person to person by touch
definition[2]: a feeling or attitude that spreads quickly between people or places
example[1]: a contagion of fear spread from city to city
definition[3]: when problems in one country, area etc spread to other countries etc
example[2]: Europe and Japan are feeling the effects as the slow US economy spreads its contagion.
example[3]: The Japanese banking crisis has created the possibility of worldwide financial contagion.
